SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+index_desc(purchs_warehousing_header PK_PURCHS_WAREHOUSING_HEADER)*/ ROWNUM RN, h.warehousing_chit, h.warehousing_date, b.goods_lot_num, b.warehousing_unit_total_amount, b.warehousing_standard_quantity, b.warehousing_unit_price, b.warehousing_supply_price, b.manufacture_date, b.warehousing_vat, v.vendor_name, g.goods_code, g.goods_name, g.goods_standard, o.option_code, o.option_name, w.warehouse_name, e.employee_name FROM purchs_warehousing_header h JOIN purchs_warehousing_body b ON h.warehousing_header_num = b.warehousing_header_num JOIN grpwr_vendor v ON h.vendor_id = v.vendor_id JOIN purchse_option o ON o.option_num = b.option_num JOIN purchse_goods g ON g.goods_num = o.goods_num JOIN stdr_warehouse w ON w.warehouse_id = b.warehouse_id JOIN hr_employee e ON h.employee_num = e.employee_num WHERE h.company_num = #{companyNum}
ORDER BY h.warehousing_date DESC ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchs_warehousing_header h JOIN purchs_warehousing_body b ON h.warehousing_header_num = b.warehousing_header_num JOIN grpwr_vendor v ON h.vendor_id = v.vendor_id JOIN purchse_option o ON o.option_num = b.option_num JOIN purchse_goods g ON g.goods_num = o.goods_num JOIN stdr_warehouse w ON w.warehouse_id = b.warehouse_id JOIN hr_employee e ON h.employee_num = e.employee_num WHERE h.company_num = #{companyNum}
